game.name: Brigador Killers
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Isometric insurgency simulator. Fight on foot and in vehicles, build and steal a private arsenal and kill some rich pricks who ruined it for the rest of us.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Isometric insurgency simulator. Fight on foot and in vehicles, build and steal a private arsenal and kill some rich pricks who ruined it for the rest of us.
